title: Unable to connect to login queue
body:
So today I tried login into the league client and it gets to the authentication steps, then, however, it pops up with it saying unable to connect to login queue? is there any fix to this? tried restarting my league, tried restarting my computer, and tried using my phones 4g to connect but nothing seems to work. 

Thanks,

replies.body: yeah im having the same issue right now :(
This happend to me too pls fix this I want to use kayn so bad I don't know what to play anymore
I had the same problem i just flushed my DNS and it resolved it.
RITO PLZ! I've been trying to login for a very long time please fix it fast because Kayn is out and I was waiting for this moment. Plz <3

I'm unable to help very much with connecting to EUW. If you're playing from within Oceania, it's possible that the issue you're seeing is the same problem as [we're seeing with the CDN connectivity ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0034)- but otherwise it's likely to be another issue!
Im so glad to know that im not the only one with this problem, and that riot is gunna try and halp (pls)
Me too it seems to work last night but then when i logged in this morning, its says unable to connect to the login queue. Plz help (i also reinstall league as well still didnt help the issue).

We're currently aware of the issue, and [we're tracking it in this thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006). There's a list of things that will help us to troubleshoot the problem - could you check that out and post in that thread with your results?
Seems to be happening to a lot of people, might just have to wait for Rito to do something {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
